CHAP. IX*

AnJB to prevent the mixing or adulterating of Strong Waters and other fpiritvous Liquors,

WHEREAS many pernicious materials and ingredients are on account of their cheapnefs and intoxicating qualities frequently ufed in the making and diddling of ftrong waters and other fpirituous liquors ;
